create_central_kitchen.ponder.tag.farmer: Items and Components related to farmer's delight automation.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.basket.tex: Basket can collect transported items from belt.
Besides facing upwards, corresponding horizontal facing is also suitable.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.blaze_stov: Hire a Chef
To create a Blaze Stove, right-click the Blaze Burner with a Cooking Guide in hand when sneaking.
Cooking Guides are for Cooking Pots, other guides for different kitchen wares are also applicable.
Expert chef
Blaze Stove can provide mechanical arm support for the Pot, so let it control the cooking!
Cooking can still be done even without adding fuel to the Blaze Stove.
The hotter the fire, the faster the cooking.
Of course, you can also use Block Stove to fry things directly.
But please note that seething fire can burn your ingredients directly.
Control the Kitchen
Blaze Stove can provide mechanical arm support for the Pot, but it needs to be configured to work.
Right clicking the Blaze Stove to open the Cooking Guide menu.
Once you assigned a valid recipe to the Cooking Guide, the Cooking Pot above will become interactive with Mechanical Arms.
For input, the Mechanical Arm will insert containers and defined ingredients.
For output, the Mechanical Arm will extract result and invalid ingredients.
Blazing heat
Blaze Stove is an active heat source, the hotter the fire, the faster the cooking.
But cooking can still be done with passive heat.
Of course, you can also use Blaze Stove to fry things directly.
But please note that seething fire can burn your ingredients in an instant.
To retrieve the Cooking Guide, right-click the Blaze Stove with wrench when sneaking.
